name: Ch 27 - Faraday (No Audio)
description:
If you're here from AO3. you know why you're here.

If you're not here from AO3, you're probably lost, and you should probably go read the Cyberpunk: Edgerunners fanfic "Group Chat" first.

This is the "potato mode" version of chapter 27, made for people on devices that can't handle music streaming in Twine. If this still doesn't work, there'll be a text-only recap on AO3 later on before we get back to regularly-scheduled chapters.
